Come for the new season fit. Stay for the feel-good.

This is the season of light layers, easy silhouettes, and statement details — and this year, the collections are made to be lived in.
Published 01 January

This is the season of light layers, easy silhouettes, and statement details — and this year, the collections are made to be lived in. Whether it’s a throw-on dress that works from morning errands to sundown drinks, a streetwear set that feels as good as it looks, or beauty staples that keep your skin glowing through the heat, the pieces you’ll find in-centre this season are designed to do it all.

You’ll come in for the style refresh, but you might just stay for the feel-good moments along the way.

 

Come for the Streetwear Revival

Streetwear is having a moment. This season, it’s all about relaxed structure – oversized tees, cargo skirts, and layer-ready pieces that give off effortless energy. Sneakers are the base, crossbody bags are the signal, and a cap or slick bun is the finishing touch.

For fashion that says 'cool without trying,’ check out the new drop at JD Sports and Factorie. Whether you're going monochrome or playing with pastels, the key is relaxed confidence.

 

Come for the Dresses Made to Move

The new season calls for dresses that do it all – from casual errands to brunch with friends. Think: tiered cotton minis, linen shirt dresses, and playful prints that let the sunshine in.

Slide into Forever New or Decjuba for a fresh edit of floaty silhouettes and easy-to-wear fabrics. Pair with chunky sandals or a light denim jacket for chill days that can go anywhere.

 

Come for the Beauty Shelf Refresh

New season = new skin, new shades, new rituals. It’s all about the glow-up: vitamin C serums, cream blushes, bold SPF, and long-lasting lip tints that feel fresh, not fussy.

Start at Adore Beauty or Priceline for your skincare and makeup staples. The trending tones? Coral, honey, and barely-there pinks that pair perfectly with your post-beach mood.

 

Come for the Accessories That Pull It All Together

Sometimes it’s the extras that make it. This season’s accessories are bolder, chunkier, and more personal – think layered chains, resin rings, oversized shades, and soft carryalls.

Find yours at Harli + Harpa, Pandora, or Lovisa, where you can grab a statement piece (or three) to give your look a playful twist.

 

Stay for the Little Extras That Lift the Day

You came for the wardrobe refresh – but you stayed for the matcha, the mani, the moment of pause. Because after the shopping, there’s that unexpected joy: a drink in hand, feet up, or your hands wrapped around a beauty magazine and a cold-pressed juice.

Top it off with a pit stop at Cha Time or Jungle Lab, or settle in for a slow-down at Advanced Laser Clinic. Because style isn’t just about what you wear – it’s how it makes you feel.

You’ll come in for the style refresh, but you might just stay for the feel-good moments along the way
